value.title: StarCraft 2: FEAR THE THUNDER! (Maru vs soO)
value.excerpt: Terran Mech seems to be new gold standard in the Zerg versus Terran match-up in StarCraft 2. In this top-level match between Maru and soO the Terran also decides to go for an army composition based primarily around Thors, Siege Tanks and Battlecruisers.
